item.title: Hello Kitty Island Adventure sales top one million
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

500,000 units sold since March.

Total sales for open-world adventure game Hello Kitty Island Adventure have surpassed one million units just 30 days after its January 30 release for Switch and PC via Steam, developer Sunblink announced.

Hello Kitty Island Adventure first launched for Apple Arcade on July 28, 2023, followed by Switch and PC via Steam on January 30, 2025, PlayStation 5 on August 5, 2025, and Switch 2 on November 13, 2025. A PlayStation 4 version was announced, but it is unclear whether it is still planned.

Sales for Hello Kitty Island Adventure were last reported in March to have surpassed 500,000 units, just one month after its Switch and PC release.

Here is a brief overview of the game, via Sunblink:

Hello Kitty Island Adventure has redefined the “cozy adventure” genre, blending comforting activities like crafting and decorating with a vast, explorable world filled with quests, challenges and puzzle-solving. Widely celebrated by fans and critics alike, the game has been honored with Apple Arcade’s Game of the Year and a Webby People’s Voice Award, alongside major nominations including Best Mobile Game at The Game Awards 2023 and Mobile Game of the Year at the 27th Annual D.I.C.E. Awards.

In Hello Kitty Island Adventure, Hello Kitt® invites you to join her and her friends at Big Adventures Park, where My Melody™ is opening a brand-new gift shop. Express yourself as an original, Sanrio-style avatar with a wide range of adorable customization options. Cook delicious food and decorate your space with hundreds of furniture items. Share gifts and complete quests to deepen your friendship with beloved characters. Invite other players to your island and complete multiplayer challenges or build beautiful vacation homes together.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/hello-kitty-island-adventure-sales-top-one-million

item.title: Death Howl launches December 9 for PC, in 2026 for PS5, Xbox Series, and Switch
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Soulslike deckbuilder dated.

Soulslike deckbuilder Death Howl will launch for PC via Steam on December 9, followed by PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch in 2026, publisher 11 bit studios and developer The Outer Zone announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via 11 bit studios:

Blending beloved mechanics into something entirely its own, Death Howl is a genre-defying Soulslike deckbuilder that tells the story of Ro, a mother from a shamanic tribe, who refuses to accept the loss of her child. In a desperate act, she descends into the spirit world to fight for a second chance.

Minimalist in presentation but unafraid of raw, harrowing themes, Death Howl unfolds as a metaphorical journey through sorrow, survival and acceptance. It’s a hunt where every step forward carries a cost—and every enemy demands a study worthy of a huntress.

True to soulslike tropes, defeat is not the end, but part of the learning path. Resting revives fallen foes, and understanding enemy behavior is crucial to progress. Death Howl enhances this structure with tactical, grid-based combat, deck-building systems, and action-RPG exploration across eerie, hostile biomes.

Each region introduces not just new enemies and active and passive abilities, but also new cards that offer deck-tailoring possibilities, allowing players to shape their tactical approach as they progress. Every fallen spirit adds to Ro’s strength in this quiet war of grief and resolve.

Will Ro reclaim what was taken from her? Or will the spirit world take her too?

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/death-howl-launches-december-9-for-pc-in-2026-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-switch

item.title: Co-op open-world survival roguelite game Brightfall announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
About

Make it through the darkness—or become a part of it.

Brightfall is a cooperative open-world survival roguelite for up to four players, set on a cursed 17th-century island erased from English maps. Build, craft, and push back the living darkness before it swallows the world.

Welcome to the Isle the Crown Pretends Doesn’t Exist

The year is 1666. The Great Plague of London has just ended… But it seems your troubles are only just beginning. You awaken shipwrecked on Brightfall Island, a place so cursed that even the Royal Navy has orders to pretend it doesn’t exist.

They say every plague in history began here—the Black Death, the Justinian blight, and now, the darkness reborn.
Fog hides it from the world, storms guard its shores… and yet the Crown thinks it’s a perfect place to put its prisoners.

One of them was you.

Now you’ll have to scavenge, build, and fight to keep your light burning a little longer—because when it dies, your sanity follows. Explore abandoned Celtic ruins, upgrade your character, and craft stronger light sources to push deeper into the evershifting gloom.

But beware—light fades, monsters grow stronger, and even your friends can fall to the madness.

Beware the Living Darkness

Branches twist. Birdsong fades. Trees grow wild and unfamiliar. You have stepped into the darkness—and it is watching you.

On Brightfall, darkness is not just the absence of light. It bends trees, warps stone, and unravels the world until nothing human remains.

But you are not powerless.

Every torch buys you a minute of sanity.

Use it wisely to carve a circle of sanity in the gloom, pushing corruption back one trembling step at a time. The deeper you dare to go, the stronger that light must become.

Let it fade, and the island will take you back.

Hold the Light—Alone or Together

Survival in Brightfall is a shared struggle against time, dwindling supplies, and the creeping dark. One up to four survivors can brave the island together. Scavenge, craft, and defend the light while your friends argue about who forgot the tinder again.

Prefer to walk the path alone? The island won’t let you face it completely unaided. A flicker of ancient will—a Celtic spirit bound to the light—can guide your steps, mend your wounds, and whisper warnings when the dark closes in.

Be kind to your companions—living or spectral. You might need them to drag you out of the grave within the next hour. When one of you falls, the others can bring them back by burning a Resurrection Token—a spark of the same light that keeps the darkness at bay.

Lose them all, and the expedition ends. The map collapses, the cycle resets, and the island changes its shape once more.

Venture into the Unknown

Beyond the fragile glow of your base lies an island that refuses to stay still. Each failure reshapes its coasts and ruins—twisting paths, swallowing landmarks, and spitting them out somewhere new.

But not all is lost. Every corrupted biome you cleanse and every ancient beast you fell leaves behind a sanctuary, a small fortress of light that endures through the resets. These sanctuaries let you push deeper—into deserts scorched by false suns, frozen cliffs where even shadows freeze, and finally, the Heart of Darkness itself.

The more you reclaim, the harder the island fights back.

Turn Fire and Iron Into Salvation

You start with nothing but your bare hands and a flickering torch. Hunt for scraps, stitch together rags, and raise a shack against the storm. Then come iron tools. Then musket fire. Then sanctuaries so bright the darkness itself shrinks away.

Each expedition expands your reach: sawmills, quarries, mines, even automatons that harvest while you explore. As you gather resources and unlock blueprints, your base grows from a flickering campfire into a safe haven.

Not all heroes wield swords. Some build the light that lets the rest survive.

Die. Learn. Repeat.

Every expedition is only the beginning. Brightfall remembers what you’ve earned, but never lets you rest easy.

Knowledge wrested from the dark becomes new skills, unique blueprints, and insights. With each run, you forge stronger tools, unlock fresh abilities, and carve your own path through the gloom. You can choose from distinct roles and looks, customize your path and skills, then update them independently from the World’ state.

The world reshapes after every fall—but wisdom endures. And in Brightfall, wisdom burns brighter than fire.

Survive the Dark, or Become Part of It

Your sanity fades with the light.

Stray too far into the dark, and it will begin to whisper. At first, it’s just the wind. Then footsteps. Then your own voice, asking you to stay.

The longer you linger, the more it takes—your sight, your thoughts, your name. Until nothing human remains.

Those who stray too far become Shadows, mindless hunters drawn to the warmth of their former allies.

Only your team can bring you back—if they’re fast enough. Drag your friend toward the firelight… or run before the darkness wears their face.

One way or another, everyone answers the dark eventually.

Key Features

  • Beware the Living Darkness – Light is your only weapon. Ignite lanterns, push back corruption, and carve circles of sanity in a world that twists with every flicker.
  • Survive Together or Perish Alone – Brave the cursed island with 1-4 players. Scavenge, craft, and defend your shared flame while arguing over who forgot the tinder again.
  • Venture into the Unknown – Each fall reshapes the island. Cleanse corrupted biomes, conquer ancient bosses, and anchor new sanctuaries that endure between runs.
  • Turn Fire and Iron Into Salvation – Your torchlight may fade, but your creations burn brighter with every expedition.
  • Die, Learn, and Rise Again – Every failure feeds your knowledge. Unlock new blueprints, roles, and skills that persist across resets, growing stronger as the island grows crueler.
  • Resist or Embrace the Madness – The longer you linger in the dark, the more it calls your name. Save your friends from the abyss, or join it and hunt them instead.

Everything Clear?

Jolly good—now try not to die, lad.

Or better yet: join our Discord or the Steam discussions and tell us what you’d like to see on the island.

Brightfall is a story we want to write with you—one mad idea at a time.

Watch the announcement trailer below.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/co-op-open-world-survival-roguelite-game-brightfall-announced-for-pc

item.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom coming to PS VR2 on November 21
item.content:encoded:
• PS VR2
  • PS5

An interactive and cinematic anime.

Publisher Astrea and developers Bandai Namco Filmworks, Atlas V, and Albyon will release “interactive and cinematic anime” Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom for PlayStation VR2 on November 21, the companies announced.

Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom first launched for Quest on October 3, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Astrea:

About

Embark on an epic adventure with Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom, a groundbreaking virtual reality experience.

The First-Ever Interactive and Cinematic Anime

This feature-length interactive cinematic story tailored for Gundam enthusiasts, anime fans, and virtual reality lovers alike, will offer a unique opportunity to dive deep into the heart of one of Japan’s most iconic anime universes.

Set in the Universal Century, this immersive journey places you at the center of an interactive cinematic experience like no other. As the main character of your own story, you’ll be able to explore the universe of Mobile Suit Gundam like never before.

Get it today and prepare to discover what it truly means to be a hero in the Universal Century. Your Gundam awaits!

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation VR2 Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/mobile-suit-gundam-silver-phantom-coming-to-ps-vr2-on-november-21

item.title: MARVEL Cosmic Invasion physical editions announced
item.content:encoded:
Publisher Dotemu and developer Tribute Games will release physical standard and “Deluxe” editions of MARVEL Cosmic Invasion for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and Switch on March 13, 2026, the companies announced. The Switch 2 version will ship with the full game on the card.

The “Deluxe” edition will include a copy of the game, a SteelBook, a set of 15 5.32 x 6.69″ premium character art cards, a set of sticker sheets, a 21.38 x 13.31″ poster, and a collectible art box. Pre-orders are available now at participating retailers.

Pricing for the physical editions is as follows:

  • Standard Edition
    • PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch – $39.99
    • Switch 2 – $49.99 (full game on card)
  • Deluxe Edition
    • PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch – $59.99
    • Switch 2 – $69.99 (full game on card)

MARVEL Cosmic Invasion is due out digitally for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on December 1, 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via Dotemu:

In MARVEL Cosmic Invasion, the immortal Super Villain Annihilus has launched an unprecedented attack across the galaxy, threatening all life as we know it. Fighters, both Earth-born and cosmic, must now join forces in a star-spanning adventure against the deadly Annihilation Wave. Choosing from a unique roster of characters, brawl through the streets of New York City all the way to the depths of the Negative Zone to foil Annihilus’ vow to spread death across the cosmos with the help of Thanos, M.O.D.O.K, Taskmaster and more devious allies.

Defend the cosmos with a 15-hero playable roster, fighting as Captain America, She-Hulk, Rocket Racoon, Wolverine, Spider-Man, Storm, Phyla-Vell, Venom, Nova, Black Panther, Beta Ray Bill, Cosmic Ghost Rider, Silver Surfer, Phoenix or Invincible Iron Man. MARVEL Cosmic Invasion gives players an incredible variety of skills and styles to mix and match as they traverse across the cosmos in a star-spanning adventure.

Choose and control your own team of two characters while tagging between them mid-fight with the innovative Cosmic Swap system, capitalizing on distinct superpowers and special attacks to create unique team-ups and dish out devastating damage.

Unlock stellar powerups and rewards while experimenting with different duos and bash through a fantastic collection of locales and nemeses from the MARVEL universe. MARVEL Cosmic Invasion‘s action includes a range of accessibility features, empowering the whole family to be Super Heroes (or Villains) and supports four player drop-in/drop-out local and online co-op with crossplay.

After setting the bar for arcade-inspired beat ’em ups with the acclaimed, multimillion-selling smash hit Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder’s Revenge, Dotemu and Tribute Games modernize the timeless fun of brawlers with exciting tag-team fighting and a multi-era celebration of the most iconic comic book universe. MARVEL Cosmic Invasion embodies the spirit of classic MARVEL character designs and delivers thrilling action that’d look right at home in an arcade cabinet.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/marvel-cosmic-invasion-physical-editions-announced
